how.label: Simple and efficient
how.title: How does it work?
how.subtitle: Secure your passwords in three simple steps.

steps.s1_text: Sign up for free and create your master password. It's the only one you need to remember.
steps.s2_text: Import or manually enter your passwords. Everything is encrypted automatically.
steps.s3_text: Log in securely on all your devices thanks to synchronization.

faq.label: Frequently asked questions
faq.title: Your questions about MykeyNest
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started.

items.a1: It is a tool that stores and encrypts all your credentials in a secure digital vault. MykeyNest uses AES-256 encryption, the same standard used by banks.
items.a2: Yes. Your data is encrypted locally on your device before being synchronized. We never have access to your passwords in plain text (zero-knowledge architecture).
items.q3: Is the free plan really free?
items.a3: Yes, no credit card required. You can use MykeyNest for free with basic features. The Pro plan unlocks advanced features.
items.q4: Can I use MykeyNest on multiple devices?
items.a4: Yes, your passwords are automatically synchronized across all your devices: computer, smartphone, and tablet.
items.q5: What happens if I forget my master password?
items.a5: We cannot recover it for you (zero-knowledge). That‚Äôs why it‚Äôs essential to keep it safe. You can set up emergency recovery.
items.a6: Yes, the code is publicly available. This allows the community to verify the application's security and contribute improvements.

demo.step2_text: Install the extension in your browser

install.title: Install the extension
install.helper: Load the extension in your preferred browser
install.intro: Download the ZIP file and follow the instructions for your browser:

browsers.chrome_edge_steps:
1. Open chrome://extensions
2. Enable Developer mode
3. Click Load unpacked
4. Select the extracted folder
browsers.firefox_steps:
1. Open about:debugging
2. Click This Firefox
3. Click Load Temporary Add-on
4. Select manifest.json

tip.title: Tip:
tip.text: Once installed, pin the extension to your toolbar for quick access.

api_key.title: Get your API key
api_key.helper: This key connects the extension to your account
api_key.intro: Your personal API key lets you securely access your passwords. Copy it and keep it somewhere safe.
api_key.label: Your personal API key

warning.title: Important:
warning.text: Never share this key. It provides full access to all your passwords.

configure.title: Configure the extension
configure.helper: Final step to start using your manager
configure.intro: It only takes a few seconds to finish setup and access your passwords everywhere:

list.l1: Click the extension icon in your toolbar
list.l2: Paste your API key into the login field
list.l3: Confirm and enjoy your passwords everywhere!

configure.ready: You're ready to use the extension!

seo.title: How to create a truly secure password?
seo.intro: The security of your online accounts starts with strong passwords. Our free password generator uses advanced cryptographic algorithms to create unique and unguessable combinations.
seo.good_password_text: A secure password should combine several essential elements. It should be long enough (at least 12 characters), mix different character types (uppercase, lowercase, numbers and symbols), and above all be unique for each account.
seo.why_generator_text: Human-created passwords are often predictable and vulnerable. Our tool generates completely random passwords that provide optimal protection against brute-force attacks and hacking attempts. Each generated password is unique and cryptographically secure.
tips: Use a different password for each important account
Prefer passwords of at least 16 characters
Use a secure password manager like MykeyNest
Never share your passwords via email or SMS
seo.tech_text: Our generator uses your browser‚Äôs native Web Crypto API to produce truly random numbers. Unlike classic pseudo-random generators, this method guarantees maximum entropy and professional-grade cryptographic security.

items.q1: Are my passwords really secure with MykeyNest?
items.a1: Yes. Your data is encrypted locally with AES-256 before being sent to our servers. We use a zero-knowledge architecture: even our teams cannot read your passwords. Only your master password can decrypt them.
items.q2: Can I use MykeyNest on multiple devices?
items.a2: Absolutely. Multi-device sync is included in all plans. Your credentials are available on computer, smartphone, and tablet ‚Äî always end-to-end encrypted.
items.q3: Does the password generator store my passwords?
items.a3: No. The generator runs entirely client-side using the browser's crypto.getRandomValues API. No data is sent to our servers. The password disappears as soon as you close the tab.
items.q4: How do I upgrade to Pro?
items.a4: From your personal space, go to Settings ‚Ä∫ Subscription and click ‚ÄúUpgrade to Pro‚Äù. Payment is securely handled by Stripe. Your account is upgraded instantly with no downtime.
items.a5: Yes. The source code is publicly available on GitHub, allowing the community to audit security and contribute. Transparency is one of our core principles.
